question.text: Yo dawg, I herd you like ...
question.a1: music, so I put a tape in your pants so you can listen while you sleep!
question.a2: cars, so I put a car in your car so you can drive while you drive!
question.a3: cheating, so I put a bread in your bag so you can run while you eat!
question.a4: drinking, so I put a hat in your pocket so you can listen while you dance!
